nodes.text: Valyn Thul was a Human female who was the daughter of Altana and Markus Thul. After her father was captured trying to infiltrate House Organa, he made a deal with the Republic and send Havoc Squad lieutenant to retrieve his wife and daughter before defecting. Altana was initially skeptical, but the soldier provided the correct codeword from Markus and the women agreed to slip away. Altana and Valyn reunited with Markus in House Organa before departing Alderaan for Chandrila.
